COMMENT.mean: I've had my eye on Adam and I don't like what I see

COMMENT.mean: I don't like things if I'm not sure what they are. That's why I don;t like Ashley

COMMENT.nice: Brian rocks and rolls, all night long

COMMENT.mean: I saw Dave sneak into peoples gardens at night and fish in their ponds, he's a poacher
